snippet.title: Big Data in 2013 - Now that we have our feet on the ground
snippet.description: Mary Shacklett takes a look at what IT can expect now that it has another year of Big Data under its belt.

snippet.title: Four variants of agile development methods
snippet.description: Rick Freedman explores four agile method variants that bring the theories into real-world practice. He also discusses criteria for selecting an approach based on your IT project.
